rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 35px; margin-left: 181px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 128, 240), rgb(50, 160, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 149px; height: 1px; padding-top: 590px; margin-left: 117px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: シャドウマップのテクセル

switch.text: シャドウマップのテクセル

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 197px; height: 1px; padding-top: 730px; margin-left: 152px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FF0000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#FF0000, #ff9090); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 影が当たると判断されるポリゴン

switch.text: 影が当たると判断されるポリゴン

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 489px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 35px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.span: ↑のシーンをレンダリングする際に
オブジェクトの深度とシャドウマップ上での深度を比較し、影判定を行う

switch.text: ↑のシーンをレンダリングする際に(ライトからの)オブジェクトの深度とシャドウマップ上での深度を比較し、影判定を行う

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 508px; height: 1px; padding-top: 670px; margin-left: 28px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.span: オブジェクトをレンダリングするポリゴン複数分がシャドウマップ上の1テクセルになると、
以下のようにいくつかのポリゴンでは影がかかる判定、
その他のポリゴンでは光が当たっている判定になる

switch.text: ★★★オブジェクトをレンダリングするポリゴン複数分がシャドウマップ上の1テクセルになると、...
